name: Verify Update Customer API returns error when invalid or empty parameters are passed -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends PUT request to update customer details with "None", "None", "None", "None", and "None"
When the user receives the response from update customer API
Then the response should contain an error message "Invalid input"
And the response should contain "Invalid input:" in response body

fullName: Update Customer Details API: Verify Update Customer API returns error when invalid or empty parameters are passed
